attributes.action: Keep the right to trail by jury.
attributes.additional_details: It's a British right to have a jury of piers hold judgement over someone at trail. A standard sent around the Globe.
attributes.background: Not to change laws regarding jury trials

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Don't reduce the number of trials by jury
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710321
